name: Unidentified_male_warrior
content:
A male individual was a warrior. Rey, a Force-sensitive scavenger who hailed from Jakku, saw this warrior in a vision in which Kylo Ren killed him by impaling him on his lightsaber. The man screamed and fell to the ground.
This character was portrayed by Mark Stanley in Star Wars Episode VII The Force Awakens During the production, the character was known as "clan leader". His role was incorrectly called a "Knight of Ren" in the movie's credits.
